experiences.title: Core Member - Codebase & Artive Clubs
experiences.subtitle: IIIT Kota
workDescription: Actively contributed to the **Codebase** club, which focuses on coding, problem-solving, and promoting open-source contributions among students.
Led and organized coding workshops, hackathons, and sessions on open-source tools, fostering a collaborative learning environment.
As a core member of the **Artive** club, explored various forms of art and craft, encouraging creative expression and experimentation with new techniques and materials.
Collaborated with peers to bring innovative ideas to life through hands-on art projects and interdisciplinary activities.

experiences.title: Class Representative
experiences.subtitle: IIIT Kota, CSE Department
workDescription: Acted as a liaison between students and faculty, ensuring smooth communication and addressing concerns effectively.
Organized and coordinated academic and extracurricular activities, enhancing the overall student experience.
Represented the class in official meetings and events, contributing to decision-making and policy discussions.
Facilitated peer collaboration and problem-solving, promoting a supportive and inclusive environment.
